trans-unit.source: Backup for Windows Signavio Workflow Accelerator

seg-source.mrk: Backup for Windows Signavio Workflow Accelerator

target.mrk: Backup für Signavio Workflow Accelerator unter Windows

trans-unit.source: The <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mongodump.exe</kbd> can be found in the MongoDB installation directory, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MONGO_HOME\bin\mongodump.exe</kbd>. You just have to create a directory where the backups should be stored and make sure the user doing the backups has the necessary read / write permissions. If you followed the instructions within this guide to setup MongoDB, the command to execute mongodump would look like this:

seg-source.mrk: The <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mongodump.exe</kbd> can be found in the MongoDB installation directory, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MONGO_HOME\bin\mongodump.exe</kbd>.
You just have to create a directory where the backups should be stored and make sure the user doing the backups has the necessary read / write permissions.
If you followed the instructions within this guide to setup MongoDB, the command to execute mongodump would look like this:

target.mrk: Die Datei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">mongodump.exe</kbd> kann im MongoDB Installationsverzeichnis, also unter <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$MONGO_HOME\\bin\\mongodump.exe</kbd> gefunden werden.
Erstellen Sie ein Zielverzeichnis für die Backups und stellen Sie sicher, dass der Backup-ausführende Nutzer Lese- und Schreibzugriff auf dieses Verzeichnis hat.
Falls Sie den Installationsanweisungen in diesem Handbuch genau gefolgt sind, ist der Befehl zum erstellen des Backups wie folgt:

trans-unit.source: In the example above, adjust the location of your MongoDB installation accordingly. The parameter -u defines the username and -p the password of the Workflow Accelerator MongoDB user, replace them with your chosen values. The parameter -o specifies the output directory.

seg-source.mrk: In the example above, adjust the location of your MongoDB installation accordingly.
The parameter -u defines the username and -p the password of the Workflow Accelerator MongoDB user, replace them with your chosen values.
The parameter -o specifies the output directory.

target.mrk: Der Ort der MongoDB-Installation in dem aufgeführten Beispiel muss gegebenenfalls angepasst werden.
Der Parameter –u beschreibt den Nutzernamen, der Parameter –p das Passwort.
